alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Nacogdoches; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 10:03PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Smith, Rusk, northwestern Nacogdoches and northern Cherokee Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 1003 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mixon to near Jacksonville to near Maydelle. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Henderson, Rusk, Troup, Ponta, Pinehill, New Salem, Trawick, Joinerville, Sacul, Mixon, Turnertown, Minden, Maydelle, New Summerfield, Cushing, Mount Enterprise, Gallatin, Reklaw and Lilbert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
